briefdescription.para: Obtain a human readable form of the type id @id.

parameterdescription.para: Type id to be converted into string

simplesect.para: String representing a readable name for @id

briefdescription.para: Check if type id is boolean value (bool)

simplesect.para: Returns zero if type is integer, different from zero otherwhise

briefdescription.para: Check if type id is char value (char)

simplesect.para: Returns zero if type is char, different from zero otherwhise

briefdescription.para: Check if type id is integer value (bool, char, short, int, long)

simplesect.para: Returns zero if type is integer, different from zero otherwhise

briefdescription.para: Check if type id is decimal value (float, double)

simplesect.para: Returns zero if type is decimal, different from zero otherwhise

briefdescription.para: Check if type id is string value (char *)

simplesect.para: Returns zero if type is string, different from zero otherwhise

briefdescription.para: Check if type id is buffer value (void *)

simplesect.para: Returns zero if type is buffer, different from zero otherwhise

briefdescription.para: Check if type id is array of values (value *)

simplesect.para: Returns zero if type is array, different from zero otherwhise

briefdescription.para: Check if type id is map of values (string -> value)

simplesect.para: Returns zero if type is map, different from zero otherwhise

briefdescription.para: Check if type id is pointer value (void *)

simplesect.para: Returns zero if type is pointer, different from zero otherwhise

briefdescription.para: Check if type id is future value (future)

simplesect.para: Returns zero if type is future, different from zero otherwhise

briefdescription.para: Check if type id is function value (function)

simplesect.para: Returns zero if type is function, different from zero otherwhise

briefdescription.para: Check if type id is pointer value NULL.

simplesect.para: Returns zero if type is null, different from zero otherwhise

briefdescription.para: Check if type id is class value (class)

simplesect.para: Returns zero if type is class, different from zero otherwhise

briefdescription.para: Check if type id is object value (object)

simplesect.para: Returns zero if type is object, different from zero otherwhise

briefdescription.para: Check if type id is invalid.

simplesect.para: Returns zero if type is invalid, different from zero otherwhise
